Stealth Bitcoin Company | Fintech Developer | San Francisco | Remote, Onsite, Full Time, Part Time, Contract |

Preferably someone who has worked on financial services in the past at commercial level company. If you're interested in working on an international product, helping lay some of the infrastructure for the bitcoin space please email us at bitcoinguy111@gmail.com to get a time setup to chat. Thanks!
